channel.title: Posts on Spices & Spice Terminology Database ⸙
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Spices & Spice Terminology Database ⸙

item.title: Search & Index
item.description: You can search the website using the search bar on the left side panel. Alternatively you can also navigate to various spice pages by selecting related categories and tags visible on the right panel. This panel also includes blog posts on the current page.

item.title: Help with Markdown Syntax Guide and Hugo Shortcodes
item.description: The following markdown file showcases all the features one can achieve within markdown and with Hugo shortcodes.
